property.name: AFTER_SELECTION_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SELECTION_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after an attribute on the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_DEACTIVATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before the StoryWindow becomes inactive. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_ACTIVATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the StoryWindow becomes active. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched when the value of a property changes on this StoryWindow. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_OPEN
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a StoryWindow is opened. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_CLOSE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a StoryWindow is closed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_CLOSE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched when a StoryWindow is closing. Since the close has been committed, it can no longer be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the StoryWindow &#40;a Document).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the StoryWindow within its containing object.

property.name: selection
property.shortdesc: The selected object&#40;s). Can also accept: Object or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: bounds
property.shortdesc: The bounds of the window &#40;specified in pixels) in the form [top, left, bottom, right].

property.name: selectionKeyObject
property.shortdesc: The key object of the selection. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

parameter.name: selectableItems
parameter.shortdesc: The objects to select. Can accept: Object, Array of Objects, NothingEnum enumerator or SelectAll enumerator.

parameter.name: existingSelection
parameter.shortdesc: The selection status of the StoryWindow in relation to previously selected objects. &#40;Optional)

method.name: bringToFront
method.shortdesc: Brings the object to the front.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the StoryWindow.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
